solution_line_template: Jen used {shooting_game_cost} x {jen_plays} = <<{shooting_game_cost}*{jen_plays}={jen_tickets}>>{jen_tickets} tickets in the shooting game.
Russel used {carousel_cost} x {russel_rides} = <<{carousel_cost}*{russel_rides}={russel_tickets}>>{russel_tickets} tickets in the carousel.
Therefore, they used {jen_tickets} + {russel_tickets} = <<{jen_tickets}+{russel_tickets}={total_tickets}>>{total_tickets} tickets in all.
